医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
超过 100 万项比赛记录显示东非人是 50 公里超级马拉松跑得最快的人《科学报告》中的一项研究分析了 50 公里超级马拉松精英运动员的年龄和国家，结果显示，跑得最快的运动员来自非洲国家，其最佳表现年龄在 20 至 24 岁之间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Over-1-million-race-records-show-East-Africans-as-fastest-in-50-km-ultra-marathons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Over-1-million-race-records-show-East-Africans-as-fastest-in-50-km-ultra-marathons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9cf0c7b-15d2-4f2b-a8e4-a43766c9ac23 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 22:33:00 -0400 Over 1 million race records show East Africans as fastest in 50-km ultra-marathons
植物性饮食和生活方式干预对 RA 患者的长期益处为期 16 周的植物促进关节试验调查了多学科生活方式干预与常规护理相比对 RA 患者的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Long-term-benefits-of-plant-based-diet-and-lifestyle-intervention-in-RA-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Long-term-benefits-of-plant-based-diet-and-lifestyle-intervention-in-RA-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2094db9e-c97c-49c5-aa47-820b1f901033 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 22:23:56 -0400 Long-term benefits of plant-based diet and lifestyle intervention in RA patients
父本和母本移植可促进剖腹产后婴儿肠道健康研究人员探讨了父亲在婴儿肠道播种中的作用以及母体粪便微生物移植诱导播种的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Paternal-and-maternal-transplants-boost-infant-gut-health-after-cesarean-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Paternal-and-maternal-transplants-boost-infant-gut-health-after-cesarean-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f61b4b7-04d0-4a62-bc61-e83a8d1f5076 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 21:32:00 -0400 Paternal and maternal transplants boost infant gut health after cesarean delivery
新的开放获取资源揭示了印度食品的营养成分科学家开发了一个开放式的印度营养数据库，其中包含生食和常用食谱的营养成分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/New-open-access-resource-reveals- Nutrition-content-of-Indian-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/New-open-access-resource-reveals-nutrition-content-of-Indian-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b7cc800-012a-4e61-b534-436d3aba5695 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 21:10:00 -0400 New open-access resource reveals nutrient content of Indian foods
有前途的基因编辑疗法为镰状细胞病的治疗带来了希望研究人员公布了一项临床试验的最新结果，旨在寻找镰状细胞病的治疗方法，镰状细胞病是一种痛苦的遗传性血液疾病，治疗选择有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Promising-gene-editing-therapy-shows-hope-in​​-sickle-cell-disease-cure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Promising-gene-editing-therapy-shows-hope-in​​-sickle-cell-disease-cure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8db04f56-f23f-48c6-b27c-e1b8fa727ef9 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 19:15:00 -0400 Promising gene editing therapy shows hope in sickle cell disease cure
St. Jude 研究人员揭示了 NLRC5 在免疫反应和细胞死亡中的作用先天免疫系统负责保护人体免受可能导致疾病或感染的威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/St-Jude-researchers-uncover-NLRC5s-role-in-immune-response-and-cell-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/St-Jude-researchers-uncover-NLRC5s-role-in-immune-response-and-cell-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af381d8c-86af-4257-aa97-a4fc5aeb2022 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 19:05:00 -0400 St. Jude researchers uncover NLRC5's role in immune response and cell death
TIMP-1 蛋白被发现可以增强免疫系统对抗癌症的能力芬兰图尔库大学的研究人员发现了现有蛋白质的新功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/TIMP-1- Protein-found-to-boost-immune-systems-fight-against-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/TIMP-1- Protein-found-to-boost-immune-systems-fight-against-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fc93ef4-1634-4a31-bc34-69b80a1b42c9 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 11:53:00 -0400 TIMP-1 protein found to boost immune system's fight against cancer
杜氏肌营养不良症的新治疗方法将 LED 疗法与艾地苯醌相结合在杜氏肌营养不良症的动物模型中，巴西研究人员测试了一种将激光或发光二极管 (LED) 的光生物调节与艾地苯醌相结合的疗法，艾地苯醌是一种抗氧化化合物，研究用于治疗神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-therapeutic-approach-for-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy-combines-led-therapy-with-idebenone.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-therapeutic-approach-for-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy-combines-led-therapy-with-idebenone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5aacfa6d-8406-4f7b-b725-f0b33e88a697 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 11:42:00 -0400 New therapeutic approach for Duchenne muscular dystrophy combines LED therapy with idebenone
全球研究证实泮托拉唑在减少 ICU 上消化道出血方面的作用麦克马斯特大学研究人员领导的一项全球研究和荟萃分析结果显示，一种广泛使用的药物有助于使用呼吸机的危重成人预防上消化道出血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Global-study-confirms-泮托拉唑-role-in-reducing-upper-GI-bleeding-in-the-ICU.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Global-study-confirms-泮托拉唑-role-in-reducing-upper-GI-bleeding-in-the-ICU.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a98e367f-bb1b-48af-8253-4760ed9ca51a Fri, 14 Jun 2024 11:33:00 -0400 Global study confirms pantoprazole's role in reducing upper GI bleeding in the ICU
科学家揭示了红光调节组氨酸激酶如何发挥作用的新见解科学家们揭示了红光调节组氨酸激酶如何发挥作用的新信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Scientists-reveal-new-insights-into-how-red-light-regulated-histidine-kinases-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Scientists-reveal-new-insights-into-how-red-light-regulated-histidine-kinases-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fea0c24-cd84-4f92-b86b-a518085e756f Fri, 14 Jun 2024 11:24:00 -0400 Scientists reveal new insights into how red light-regulated histidine kinases function
